sentences.english: "Before, everyone went to healers for things like liver problems or cancer," he said.
sentences.chinese: 以前，每个人都会找治疗师看肝病或癌症这样的问题。

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, people with alcoholic liver disease often have hepatitis C as well.
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，人们往往与酒精性肝病和丙型肝炎。

sentences.english: Methods The model of alcoholic hepatic disorder was established by feeding alcohol liquor.
sentences.chinese: 方法白酒灌胃法建立酒精性肝病大鼠模型。

sentences.english: To study the occurrence of primary liver cancer (PLC) among benignant hepatism patients with AFP rise.
sentences.chinese: 探讨AFP升高的良性肝病患者原发性肝癌发生率。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between cholelithiasis and the infection of HBV.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨乙肝病毒感染在胆石症发病中的作用。

sentences.english: When liver disease is expected, splenomegaly should be sought.
sentences.chinese: 当怀疑肝病时，应该寻找肿大的脾脏。

sentences.english: Results showed Dispersing blood stasis therapy had better clinical effects.
sentences.chinese: 提示通瘀法治疗肝病有较好疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To construct an expression system of HBsAg in ginseng cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立乙肝病毒表面抗原的人参细胞表达系统。

sentences.english: Methods Rat model of alcoholic liver disease were established by alcohol administration.
sentences.chinese: 方法酒精灌胃法制备大鼠酒精性肝病模型。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of Sugan Qingzhi Decoction on mixed liver disease fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 观察疏肝清脂汤治疗混合性肝病肝纤维化的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-HBV effect of ethanol extract from Styelec plicata Lesueur in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究皱瘤海鞘乙醇提取物的体外抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Her life was finally extinguished by the onset of liver complaint.
sentences.chinese: 她的生命之火终因肝病发作而被掐灭了。

sentences.english: Conclusion The oxymatrine has the strong anti-HBV virus function.
sentences.chinese: 结论苦参素具有较强抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Combination of modem and traditional medicines may be the most prospective way.
sentences.chinese: 抗乙肝病毒的前景可能在中西药的联合应用上。

sentences.english: Bombing survivors have developed various illnesses from radiation exposure, including cancer and liver illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者因遭受辐射普遍患有癌症和肝病以及其他疾病。

sentences.english: Hepatologists know that glutathione plays a critical role in the liver.
sentences.chinese: 肝病学者了解谷胱甘肽对肝脏的重要性。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
